resources.string:
Quotes is a free Android application, made by me, Luca. Quotes does not collect any data and never will. Every interaction with me is selectable. I am offering the possibility of sending me mails, which includes bugs, features and/or feedback. When the conversation with the user has ended, I will delete the contact data and the conversation due to the security of data.

I may change the Privacy Policy. Every change is effective immediately. An information of the change of the Privacy Policy can be found on the changelog

Effective September 3, 2022

I want to say thank you especially to two developers who teach me how to code even though my knowledge was at around 0%. The developers helped me (and still do) even if I never understood anything (and still don\'t :3). So huge thanks, Yanndroid and Tenseventy7!

This app uses some permissions. This page will explain to you why my app needs these permissions.

Read and write storage: The Quotes app needs to be able to read and write to the storage in order to save and install app updates on the device. No data is written to storage.

Full Internet Access: This permission allows my app to get the quotes from my file on the Internet. No data is collected from me.

Install unknown packages: This permission allows my app to install the update.
Here\'s what I did while it was happening:\nThis is the bug:
Hello Luca, I wanted to tell you about my experience with the app
Hi Luca, I was thinking about the following feature.\n\nHave a nice day.
Go to \"Permissions\" and set \"Files and media\" to \"Allow\".
This app needs permission to read your storage and write to your files. If you have doubts about privacy then read \"App Permissions\".
The quote has been copied to your clipboard.

This app uses following licenses:

Lottie files with LottieFiles-License:
According to Lottie: \'Use of Files without attributing the creator(s) of the Files is permitted under this license, though attribution is strongly encouraged. If attributions are included, such attributions should be visible to the end user.\'
I used following Lottie-Animations:
update (Blue loader for update) by Domenico Gonnelli
Testimonials Icon (Smooth reveal icon for testimonials - web design.) by Rachel Eppy
no wifi connection error (no wifi connection error animation) by quang_do204
Your device currently is not connected to the internet
Restart app to completely apply new theme
Restart app to completely apply new language
How do you want to send a bug report? Chose between Telegram and E-Mail. Keep in mind, that every conversation WILL BE deleted after everything is done, EXCEPT you want to keep it.
How do you want to send a feature suggestion? Chose between Telegram and E-Mail. Keep in mind, that every conversation WILL BE deleted after everything is done, EXCEPT you want to keep it.
How do you want to send your feedback? Chose between Telegram and E-Mail. Keep in mind, that every conversation WILL BE deleted after everything is done, EXCEPT you want to keep it.
I really am sorry, if you found a bug. I will do everything I can to fix it as soon as possible! Click here, to send me an E-Mail
Is there something you like me to add? I can try it, just click here, to send me an E-Mail
Share this app with your friends, to let them see the wisdoms and quotes of others too!
If you like this app or you do not like this app, i really would be happy, if you send me the reasons :3
You may have been asked to allow some permissions. Go on, and find out why!
Afraid, that I collect your data? Read this and find out, that I do not :3
I am using third-party content too. In the future, here you can find out, what I am using.
Your language currently is not supported. Because of that, your language is set to English
Check if there is an update available
